DOC.brief_summary: The long-term safety and efficacy of nalmefene hydrochloride at 20 mg in patients with alcohol dependence will be evaluated in a multicenter, open-label, uncontrolled trial.
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Extension Study for the Phase 3 Study of Nalmefene (339-14-001) in Patients With Alcohol Dependence
DOC.criteria: Patients who have completed Study 33914001 Patients who have signed the informed consent form for Study 33914002 The patient has a clinically significant unstable illness (eg, complication of New York Heart Association (NYHA) class III or IV heart failure or angina pectoris, renal function disorder with estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) of < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2, hepatic failure, and neoplastic disorder) The patient has a clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram (ECG) which is inappropriate for the participation in the trial in the opinion of the investigator or subinvestigator
